section: Without warning, the floor of the passage opens beneath you and you fall about ten feet. Small stones start to shower down on you. No - not stones, but gold coins! Riches beyond mortal imaginings? You start to feel uneasy. The shower becomes a downpour of gold, and you frantically try to scramble out. Large gold bars begin to fall, and one of them strikes you senseless. You crumple on to a bed of coins and are buried alive under a mountain of gold. .
